titleStmt.title: The circle, or, Conversations on love and gallantry originally in French : now Englished, and since augmented with several new songs, illustrated with musical notes, both treble and base / by Nath. Noel, gent. ...
titleStmt.author: Montfort, de.
Brémond, Gabriel de.
Noel, Nathaniel.

notesStmt.note: Also attributed to Gabriel de Brémond.
Errors in paging: p. 26-27 numbered 20, 22; p. 29-30 numbered 24- 25.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
